name: MusicIntervals
0:
”Alexa, start interval trainning”
”Alexa, launch interval trainning and start with third”
”Alexa, launch interval trainning and start expert mode.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: interval training
des:
This skill presents a series of note sequences to help you train your hearing. You can choose to practice per set of intervals or have me randomly picked them up.

There are two modes, basic and expert. Basic mode focuses on a set of intervals and both notes and interval naming guides are said. You will only need to state the quality of the interval (augmented, major, minor, perfect). Expert mode doesn't provide any guide and picks intervals at random. You need to respond with the full interval name "major third".
Specific interval sets can be selected by saying their name "thirds", "fourths" and so on.
Interval guides and note guides can be shut by saying "No interval guide" or "no notes guides" ("interval guide" and "say notes" will bring them back).
Interval direction can be changed by saying "Descending" or "Ascending".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
